paragraphs.p: - 🌉 The Golden Gate Bridge: it spans almost 2 miles (3.2 kilometres) long and 750 feet (228 metres) high. It connects San Francisco to the Marin Headlands.
Fun fact: the fictional city San Fierro from Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas was based on San Francisco.
- Los Angeles Country Museum of Art
- La Brea Tar Pits and George C. Page Museum: preserved animals and plants
- Rodeo Drive (in Beverly Hills 🤑): the world’s most expensive place to shop
- 🎥 Hollywood and 👣 Hollywood Walk of Fame
- Los Angeles Port: USS Iowa: a World War II battleship
- Santa Monica Mountains: The Getty Center

Fun fact: the fictional city Los Santos from Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas and Grand Theft Auto V was modelled after Los Angeles. The city doesn’t feature all of the above locations, but you can find some of the more iconic ones, e.g. Galileo Observatory (Griffith Observatory), Vespucci Beach (Venice Beach), the Vinewood sign (the Hollywood sign), Del Perro Pier (Santa Monica Pier).
